textos_fuente.text: Meet The Team - Bonaventure About Us Why Bonaventure Why Private Real Estate Why Multifamily Our Strategy Meet The Team Investments BMIT Bonaventure Tax Deferral Solutions Co-Investments Portfolio Development Who We Serve Investors Financial Advisors Family Offices Property Owners Schedule A Call Meet the Team We own lots of great properties and businesses. But, by far, our most valuable assets are our people. We create a culture of learning that empower our people, by continuously moving forward, innovating, and improving. Our team is composed of dynamic and knowledgeable professionals who are great investors, entrepreneurs and leaders who see the way through when everyone else just sees obstacles. Because we operate with our core values as guiding principles, we are a galvanizing force focused on our clients’ needs. Bonaventure Executive Team Dwight Dunton Founder, CEO, CIO Bio > Dwight Dunton Founder, CEO, CIO LinkedIn > Dwight founded Bonaventure in 1999 and maintains oversight over all aspects of Bonaventure, including strategic planning, organizational structure and business development. He possesses a deep knowledge of the multifamily industry including acquisitions, financing, and operations. He leverages his expertise to drive the organization forward. Prior to founding Bonaventure, Dwight served as Director of Corporate and Strategic Development at Franklin Credit Management. He received a Bachelor of Science in Finance from the McIntire School of Commerce at the University of Virginia. Chris Cobb President, Bonaventure Development Bio > Chris Cobb President, Bonaventure Development LinkedIn > Chris joined Bonaventure in 2006 and is responsible for all development activities. Before joining Bonaventure, Chris worked at KPMG in Philadelphia, PA. Chris has a Bachelor of Science in Accounting from Villanova University and a Master of Science in Real Estate from Johns Hopkins University. He earned a Certified Commercial Investment Member (CCIM) designation and is also a licensed salesperson in Virginia. Stephen Burch Chief Financial Officer Bio > Stephen Burch Chief Financial Officer LinkedIn > Mr. Burch is our Chief Financial Officer. Mr. Burch joined Bonaventure in 2022 as Chief Accounting Officer. In April 2024, he was named Chief Financial Officer. In his current capacity, he is responsible for treasury management, capital allocation and financing, FP&A, accounting, financial reporting, and income tax compliance. Before joining Bonaventure, Mr. Burch was Chief Accounting Officer at Middleburg Communities, a vertically integrated Multifamily investment management, development, and general contracting firm. Prior to joining Middleburg, he held various roles at Washington REIT, an NYSE-listed, publicly traded real estate investment trust. Most recently, he served as Controller, overseeing accounting, financial reporting, income tax, and REIT compliance. Before joining Washington REIT, Mr. Burch was a Manager in PwC’s Financial Services Assurance practice and held various roles at PwC from 2008 through 2016. Mr. Burch obtained a Master of Accounting from the College of Charleston and a Bachelor of Science in Financial Management with a Minor in Accounting from Clemson University. Mr. Burch is a certified public accountant. Development JP Hyland Vice President, Development Bio > JP Hyland Vice President, Development LinkedIn > JP joined Bonaventure in 2003, initially working on the acquisition of new properties. Eventually transitioning to a ground up development role, JP is now VP of Development. In this capacity, he and his team focus on site selection, entitlement, underwriting, and all development and construction phases for Bonaventure’s newest ventures. JP became a Partner in 2010. He has been directly involved with the acquisition and construction of over 5,000 apartments. Jeff Price Principal Architect Bio > Jeff Price Principal Architect Jeff joined Bonaventure in 2007. As principal architect and partner, Jeff is responsible for visioning potential development sites for Bonaventure and Bonaventure’s partners in success. Jeff is also responsible for design management of Bonaventure’s portfolio of projects and investment opportunities. Jeff has over 30 years’ experience in the architectural and construction field and provides vision and guidance throughout the organization. Jeff has a professional degree in Architecture from Drury University and is a licensed and NCARB certified architect and licensed contractor. Jeff is based out of Liberty, Missouri. Ben Flood Development Manager Ben Flood Development Manager Nashwa Hassanaly Development Manager Nashwa Hassanaly Development Manager Investment Management Casey MacMaster Senior Vice President, Investments and Portfolio Manager, BMIT® Bio > Casey MacMaster Senior Vice President, Investments and Portfolio Manager, BMIT® LinkedIn > Casey joined Bonaventure in 2023 as the Portfolio Manager for the company’s perpetual life multifamily fund and its parent holding company. Prior to Bonaventure, Casey sourced and acquired Class B/B+ multifamily communities through a single-member LLC called Pinpoint. Casey acquired 884 units throughout Virginia and North Carolina markets, with dispositions realizing net-to-investor returns of a 56.2% IRR and 2.5x equity multiple. Before founding Pinpoint, he was a member of Starwood Capital Group’s acquisitions team, where he completed $1.2B of transactions across multifamily, office, retail, and industrial assets. Casey received a B.A. in Government from Harvard in 2014. Barrett Lowell Head of Asset Management Barrett Lowell Head of Asset Management Jimmy Parker Director, Investments Bio > Jimmy Parker Director, Investments LinkedIn > Jimmy Parker joined Bonaventure in 2018 as part of the Development & Acquisitions Team. Before fully transitioning his role to focus on Bonaventure’s Investments, Jimmy managed a team working on 17 development projects totaling over 3,750 units and $1 Billion in value. Since joining Bonaventure, Jimmy has been directly involved in the acquisition of over 4,500 apartment units, across more than 30 transactions and an aggregate value of over $1 Billion. Jimmy currently serves as the Director of Investments managing a team working on execution and implementation of Bonaventure’s investment strategy including core, core-plus, and value add acquisitions, structured credit investments, tax-deferred recapitalizations and more. Jimmy is responsible for executing all aspects of the investment process including deal sourcing, negotiations, due diligence, and closing. Jimmy holds a Bachelor of Science in Economics from Sewanee University. Our Banquet Facilities are newly renovated and have magnificent views of lush landscaping, surrounding lakes and the golf course. You also have access to our gorgeous outdoor patio, a garden on a lake with a private entrance. Our two beautiful Banquet rooms are wonderful places to host all of your functions including Weddings, Bar/Bat Mitzvahs, Quinces, Sweet 16’s, Anniversaries, Corporate Outings, Business Meetings and other Celebrations of Life. We host hundreds of events each year and our professional staff will do everything to ensure that you have a memorable experience. To book your event please contact: 954-389-2100 and Press ‘2’ for Event Inquiries. Information Request Please enable JavaScript in your browser to complete this form. Website designed by Par Six Golf Media Manage Consent To provide the best experiences, we use technologies like cookies to store and/or access device information. Consenting to these technologies will allow us to process data such as browsing behavior or unique IDs on this site. Not consenting or withdrawing consent, may adversely affect certain features and functions. Functional Functional Always active The technical storage or access is strictly necessary for the legitimate purpose of enabling the use of a specific service explicitly requested by the subscriber or user, or for the sole purpose of carrying out the transmission of a communication over an electronic communications network. Preferences Preferences The technical storage or access is necessary for the legitimate purpose of storing preferences that are not requested by the subscriber or user. Statistics Statistics The technical storage or access that is used exclusively for statistical purposes. The technical storage or access that is used exclusively for anonymous statistical purposes. Without a subpoena, voluntary compliance on the part of your Internet Service Provider, or additional records from a third party, information stored or retrieved for this purpose alone cannot usually be used to identify you. Marketing Marketing The technical storage or access is required to create user profiles to send advertising, or to track the user on a website or across several websites for similar marketing purposes. Our team will be available daily from dawn to dusk to assist with your reservation. Thank you for your patience and understanding! Tournaments - Bonaventure Golf Club Skip to primary navigation Skip to main content (954) 389-2100 Book a Tee Time Bonaventure Golf Club Home Golf Course Information Book a Tee Time Scorecard Yardage Book Facilities Tournaments Photo Gallery Food & Events Event Gallery Overview Weddings Receptions & Banquets Event Facilities Contact Tournaments Our Team Choose Bonaventure Golf Club as the location of your next golf event. From the moment you begin coordination until the final award is handed out, we are here to expertly serve you. Whether you plan to hold a large corporate meeting, a charity event, or just a small group of 12 on a golf getaway, we will ensure your complete satisfaction. To get your planning underway, call 954-389-2100 or fill out the form on this page for more info. Experience Weston, FL Golf Bonaventure Golf Club combines a great golf experience with the unmatched beauty of the Weston, FL landscape. Our friendly service and gorgeous natural surroundings will bring your group back year after year. Your guests are sure to enjoy the hospitality of our staff along with the graceful beauty of our facility. The Tradition Lives on Each year Bonaventure Golf Club entertains numerous private groups and organizations. Regardless of the size of your group or the reason for your golf event, our staff works diligently to make each and every golf outing a success. Explore your options with Bonaventure Golf Club and experience what has made our golf course one of the region’s best. Our events are open to all golfers. Golf Outings - Bonaventure Golf Club Skip to primary navigation Skip to main content (954) 389-2100 Book a Tee Time Bonaventure Golf Club Home Golf Course Information Book a Tee Time Scorecard Yardage Book Facilities Tournaments Photo Gallery Food & Events Event Gallery Overview Weddings Receptions & Banquets Event Facilities Contact Golf Outings CORPORATE AND CHARITY GOLF TOURNAMENTS A dedicated staff of PGA trained golf professionals are ready to serve as your Golf Event Ambassadors. Bonaventure has hosted National Amateur and Professional P.G.A. Tour events and specializes in corporate, civic and charity golf tournaments customized to your specific needs and designed to exceed your guest’s expectations! To book your event please contact : Teo Perez , Golf Operations Manger (954) 389-2100 Tournament Services are Complimentary! CHARITY GOLF TOURNAMENTS Bonaventure is perfect for all charity golf tournaments with competitive rates allowing organizations the ability to raise funds for their special needs. The Professional staff can customize the perfect event and help you raise big $$$. Driving Range & Practice Greens NIKE Shoe & Club Rentals Fully Stocked Pro Shop 19th Hole Bar & Grille featuring Breakfast Buffets, Lunch and Dinner Menu’s Banquet & Dining Rooms Snack Bar & Beverage Service on the course Click Here For Tournaments Info CORPORATE & CIVIC GOLF OUTINGS Custom Golf Outings and Corporate Team Building events are the perfect way to grow your brand, build your team or entertain your most important customers. Bonaventure Country Club is a full service facility. Corporate Team Building Events are designed around the game of golf featuring: Tournament formats for all skill levels Individual & Group Instruction on the Fundamentals of Golf Skills Challenges: putting, chipping, pitching, sand and long drive contests NITE GOLF -The 2nd most fun you can have in the dark! Rules of Golf & Science of Golf Seminar Featuring complimentary Spa Access at the beautiful Bonaventure Resort & Spa Pamper your non-golfer while you are out on the golf course! Achieve total beauty and wellness in our 48,000 sq.ft. retreat nestled among 20 acres of lush surroundings. The aLaya Spa is an exclusive refuge for well-being offering 30 treatment rooms for signature massages and body treatments, nail and hair designs, Yoga and Spin Studio, fitness and dance classes, as well as our 2000 sq.ft. Movement Studio. The State of the Art Techno Gym, Spa Cafe, and Eucalyptus Steam, Sauna, and Whirlpool allow you the flexibility to enjoy an entire day without ever leaving our oasis. The outdoor private spa pool and Zen garden immerses you with soothing sounds in tropical foliage providing the perfect balance to your day at aLaya Spa. By visiting our spa’s website you will find an array of information, including drop down links to our full menu of services in the Spa. Each guest experience will be individually created to restore body and spirit. The Bonaventure Resort & Spa is located just ¼ mile from the Bonaventure Country Club and features 500 rooms and fabulous convention space for any size group. Bonaventure Country Club ~ where exceeding your expectations is PAR for the course! Information Request Please enable JavaScript in your browser to complete this form. Board of Directors – Ocean Reef Chamber of Commerce Skip to content About Mission & Goals Board of Directors Events Upcoming Events Luncheons Paws in the Park: Welcome back Pawty Golf Tournament University of Ocean Reef Webinars Become an Event Sponsor Join Join the Chamber of Commerce Sponsor a Member Applicant News Scholarships Instagram Join our Newsletter Job Postings Directory About Mission & Goals Board of Directors Events Upcoming Events Luncheons Paws in the Park: Welcome back Pawty Golf Tournament University of Ocean Reef Webinars Become an Event Sponsor Join Join the Chamber of Commerce Sponsor a Member Applicant News Scholarships Instagram Join our Newsletter Job Postings Directory BOARD OF DIRECTORS Brad Copeland President Going Aire Owner Air Conditioning Sales & Service Biography Brad has been part of the Ocean Reef community since the early 80s and is in his 13 th year working at Going-Aire, keeping homes cool since 1972! He’s passionate about giving back and serves on several local boards, including The Florida Keys Children’s Shelter, New Hope C.O.R.P.S. and The Academy at Ocean Reef. Ken Reda Vice President Marine Max-Ocean Reef General Manager Boat & Yacht Sales, Service, Parts & Accessories, Storage Biography With 39 years in the marine industry, Ken is your go-to guy for all things boating. He’s deeply involved in the Ocean Reef community and even holds a voting seat on the Florida Keys National Marine Sanctuary Advisory Council. Peter Raffalski Immediate Past President First Horizon Bank Senior Vice President Private Banking Group Manager Biography Peter Raffalski has been a South Florida resident since 1980 after being born and raised just outside of New York City in Westchester County. After graduating from Georgetown University, Peter began his banking career which is going on 34 years.  After 8 years with Southeast Bank / First Union, he has spent the last 23 years at IBERIABANK, formerly Gibraltar Private Bank & Trust.  His first 14 years he was the Bank's Chief Credit Officer and today he is the Private Banking Manager of the company's Ocean Reef Office. Very involved in his community, Peter has served in numerous capacities at Christ Journey Church since 2002. He currently serves on the Board of Directors of Wellspring Counseling, Habitat for Humanity of the Upper Keys and the Ocean Reef Chamber of Commerce. Previously he sat on the Boards of Communities in Schools of Miami and the Coral Gables Firemen's Pension Fund Board. Peter is married to Agnes Raffalski and together they have two college age daughters, Abigail at UF and Rebekah at FGCU. In his "spare" time, he enjoys playing golf, cooking and traveling. Yael Skinner Treasurer Ocean Reef Club Association Director of Finance & Human Resources Biography Yael is a finance and HR pro with a passion for supporting businesses and employees. She holds a Master's in Finance and serves on the Habitat for Humanity of the Upper Keys board. James Easom Director Manager/Owner, Turk Builders LLC Biography A South Florida native with over 30 years in construction, James is a hands-on leader who cares about his customers, employees, and subcontractors; and loves supporting local businesses and Chamber events. Robert Filella Director AVP – Private Client Relationship Manager First Horizon Biography Robert has over 20 years in banking and enjoys helping the Ocean Reef community grow. You’ll often find him at Chamber luncheons! John Forrer Director Protech E2 Owner Biography John has been providing top-quality technology solutions to Ocean Reef since starting his business in 2004. A dedicated Chamber member since 2007, he has spent nearly two decades supporting the local business community with innovative tech services. Mary Louise Gondek Director Keen Battle Mead & Company Ocean Reef Branch Manager, VIP Risk Advisor Biography Mary Louise is the heart of our volunteers! Passionate about community, she’s always the first to arrive at events to help set up and the last to leave after everything is wrapped up. Her dedication and energy are invaluable to the Chamber—we couldn’t do what we do without her! With over 45 years of experience in the insurance industry, both in Florida and New York, Mary Louise brings deep expertise to her role. She has been with Keen Battle Mead & Company on the Reef for 7 years and has lived in Florida for 7 years, originally hailing from Niagara Falls, NY. Mary Louise holds a Bachelor of Science degree from Niagara University. Holly Houser Director Ocean Reef Press Manager Biography A Key Largo native, Holly has been with Ocean Reef Press since 2015, serving as Senior Manager and Editor. She is a graduate of the University of Miami with degrees in Public Relations and Psychology and was actively involved in the Public Relations Student Society of America. With a passion for storytelling and community engagement, Holly ensures that Ocean Reef Press remains a trusted source of news for the Ocean Reef community. Juan Perez Director ORCA & OR Public Safety Vice President/Director of Public Safety Biography A retired Miami-Dade Police Director, Juan now leads the Ocean Reef Community Association, overseeing the community's day-to-day operations, including public safety, public works, a water treatment facility, landscaping, and all other community operations. Michael Watson Director Watson Luxury Properties at Ocean Reef Biography A lifelong member of Ocean Reef, Michael has deep roots in the community—he is the inspiration behind the "Watson’s Reuben" at Toski’s! Originally from Baltimore, he is a National Lacrosse Hall of Fame inductee and a four-time All-American at the University of Virginia. His wife, Anna, owns the Beauty Bar at ORC, adding another family touch to the community. Islande Dillon Advisory Council Ocean Reef Club Executive Director of Membership Biography Islande is the Executive Director of Membership at Ocean Reef Club. Islande has spent the past two years leading the Membership Department and Member Events Team. Originally hired in December 2006 as Member Events Manager, Islande was promoted to Director of Member Events in October 2010. She holds a Bachelor of Science in Sports Marketing degree from Nova Southeastern University and joined Ocean Reef Club from Hyatt Bonaventure. Nicole Navarro Executive Director Ocean Reef Chamber of Commerce Biography Nicole Navarro, originally from a horse farm in Pennsylvania, moved to Key Largo in 2004 and built a career in tourism and hospitality before founding Pawsitive Beginnings in 2020. The nonprofit fox sanctuary has since grown into a nationally recognized, trauma-informed therapy program, partnering with law enforcement, mental health professionals, and youth services to support survivors of abuse, addiction, and PTSD. Known for her entrepreneurial spirit and hands-on leadership, Nicole leads everything from strategic planning and grant writing to community outreach—always guided by purpose and impact. As our Executive Director, Nicole brings her energy, vision, and values to every aspect of our mission. She can be reached at director@oceanreefchamber.org . Contact Ocean Reef Chamber of Commerce 1 Dockside Lane Key Largo, FL 33037 305.340.8905 305.340.8905 director@oceanreefchamber.org Mailing Address Ocean Reef Chamber of Commerce 31 Ocean Reef Drive Suite C101-179 Key Largo, FL 33037 Mission To promote the highest standard of professionalism and service to the Ocean Reef Community, to be an advocate for our members, to promote business alliances, to provide valuable benefits and services to our members and to foster economic development within the Ocean Reef Community. © 2020 Ocean Reef Chamber of Commerce. All Rights Reserved.

Bonaventure University About Events & Conferences Golf Course SBU Golf Course Since 1929, golfers of all skill levels have enjoyed the intimate and welcoming feel of the St. Bonaventure Golf Course 9-hole track. Join us this September and October Monthly membership To apply please use the following link: https://payit.nelnet.net/form/RH7UfVub The new, late-season monthly rates Student Two-Month Membership: $100 for September & October One Month Public Membership: $150/Month (Must book during the booking period at the start of each month) Monthly and Student Two-Month Memberships can only be purchased during the following windows For September Membership and the Student Memberships: Aug. 25 - Sept. 2 For October Monthly Memberships: Sept. 24-Oct. 8 Additional information Memberships are only valid from 1st of the month or date of purchase (whichever is later) to the last day of the month. Membership covers green fee costs on days when the golf course is open. We do not guarantee a specific number of days. This membership cannot be used to receive cart passes or discounts at the snack shack. Monthly Membership cards will not be mailed. They must be picked up from the Golf Course Shop during open hours. Memberships are non-refundable. Course Information - Bonaventure Golf Club Skip to primary navigation Skip to main content (954) 389-2100 Book a Tee Time Bonaventure Golf Club Home Golf Course Information Book a Tee Time Scorecard Yardage Book Facilities Tournaments Photo Gallery Food & Events Event Gallery Overview Weddings Receptions & Banquets Event Facilities Contact Course Information “Bonaventure’s nationally famous #3 waterfall hole is a must play for all golfers to South Florida” Bonaventure’s famous championship golf course, located only 15 minutes west of Ft Lauderdale, was designed by noted architect Joe Lee and opened in 1970.  Famed golf architect and player Jack Nicklaus greatly admires Joe Lee designed golf courses, giving him the ultimate compliment, saying Lee “never built a bad course.” Joe Lee layouts have hosted scores of professional tournaments and thrilled everyday golfers for more than 60 years. To this point, the Golf Club at Bonaventure in Weston has been a past host to the prestigious Dixie Amateur Tournament where players including Tiger Woods, Sergio Garcia, and Jesper Parnevik have competed. You can book your tee time online here or if you prefer to speak with a golf associate, please call (954) 389-2100. Here at Bonaventure Golf Club we pride ourselves on the high quality of magnificent golf, superb amenities and outstanding service that we offer our valued customers. We have worked hard over the years to become a staple of the community, and in the process we have earned recognition as one of the region’s premier golf experiences.
